comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: The street off to the left with the horse bus was Devonshire Street which is now only the Devonshire Street pedestrian tunnel. The street was obliterated by railway tracks leading to the new (existing) Central Station when it moved further north.

comment.author: 90993042@N04
comment._content: Thanks GrenadierGuardsDmr for that interesting information! Am now able to pinpoint the area in my mind's eye!
